title: Diversification
description: Investing in mutual funds allows for diversification across various asset classes, reducing risk.

title: Professional Management
description: Mutual funds are managed by professional fund managers who make investment decisions on behalf of investors.

title: Liquidity
description: Most mutual funds offer liquidity, allowing investors to buy or sell their shares at the current net asset value (NAV) on any business day.

title: Affordability
description: Mutual funds typically have low minimum investment requirements, making them accessible to a wide range of investors.
